00020 #ifndef FILEINFORMATION_H
00021 #define FILEINFORMATION_H
00022 
00023 // include files for QT
00024 #include <qmap.h>
00025 
00030 class FileInformation{
00031 public:
00033   inline FileInformation(){};
00035   inline ~FileInformation(){};
00036   
00038   inline float getSamplingRate()const{return samplingRate;};
00039   
00043   QString getExtension()const{return extension;};
00044   
00048  inline QMap<int, QValueList<int> > getChannelMapping(){return channelMapping;};
00049 
00051  inline void setSamplingRate(float rate){samplingRate = rate;};
00052  
00056  inline void setExtension(QString ext){extension = ext;};
00057       
00061  inline void setChannelMapping(QMap<int, QValueList<int> >& mapping){channelMapping = mapping;};
00062   
00063 private:
00064  float samplingRate;
00065  QString extension;
00066  QMap<int, QValueList<int> > channelMapping;
00067 };
